job.title: Consulting Software Engineer
job.description: pBellwood Labs is a dynamic Product Development Consultancy with our own SaaS Marketing Dashboard product Converge founded in Atlanta and funded by Mark Cuban that has navigated to profitability and is hiring for growthppbrppWe are hiring a Consulting Software Engineer to help accelerate our growthppbrppIf you are interested in building a variety of novel and scalable Web and Mobile products this is the role for you Travel is typically only required for occasional team meetings and depending on pandemic statusppIf you want to work with a tightknit team of sharp technologists to leverage your talents and grow your skills this is the role for youppIf you want the longterm upside of an equity stake in a scalable business with the shortterm upside of profitsharing this is the role for youppWe are a Distributed team Work hard wherever you are You will not be asked to relocate to another city when office work is safe We are planning our second team retreat for all team members who are vaccinated or otherwise comfortable with travel and expect to have team gatherings 23 times a year You wont want to miss themppWe are seeking Full Stack Software Developers to build and scale a variety of Web and Mobile Products for an intriguing range of clientsppThis is a unique opportunity to work alongside an experienced team that excels at building Software as a Service SaaS products Future growth in this role may lead to a Senior Consulting Software Engineer RoleppbrppstrongQualificationsstrongppThis is a challenging and varied technical role Experience developing applications in Ruby on Rails and React or React Native is ideal though the role also requires a voracious appetite to learn and apply new skills You should be skilled at building webbased software or mobile apps and excel at learning new languages and frameworksppYou should be comfortable speaking with nontechnical clients and digesting their ideas into suggested solutions to accomplish their goals as a creative and supportive technologistppbrppstrongspan classqlcursorspanCompany DescriptionstrongppWe operate 2 businesses under one virtual roof and one common teamppBellwood Labs helps companies build and scale software productsppConverge is a Marketing Reporting Automation platform that helps Digital Marketing Agencies increase the profitability accuracy and efficiency of the reporting they provide to clients every monthppThe developer in this role contributes to our clientfacing Services projects as well as our SaaS productppbrppbrp
